issue.title: [R][CI] Build and test on Windows in Appveyor
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-3759](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3759). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3759?focusedCommentId=16794060) by Javier Luraschi (javierluraschi):*
I think we can fix this one due to https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/3693

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3759?focusedCommentId=16794191) by Uwe Korn (uwe):*
To which of the CI entries would we add this or would we create a new one?

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3759?focusedCommentId=16861677) by Wes McKinney (wesm):*
This seems unlikely for 0.14.0

***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-3759?focusedCommentId=16866572) by Francois Saint-Jacques (fsaintjacques):*
Issue resolved by pull request 4538
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/4538>
